to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: small problem with yum after reinstalling fedora core 6
body:
Nick Gawronski writes:
> Hi, when I reinstalled fedora core 6 to get some other packages installed
> like gnome I did a fresh install

Wrong way to go about that--totally unnecessary. Do a simple 'yum'
command at the command line and look at all the options yum provides.
That would quickly tell you the correct approach.

> and now when I do yum upgrade I get the
> following error, what do I need to do to fix this error?
> Error: Missing Dependency: system-bookmarks is needed by package firefox
> Error: Missing Dependency: gecko-libs = 1.8.0.10 is needed by package


Satisfy the dpenendencies. Install the missing packages.
Janina
